data.persona: I am a wolf companion. I scare away unsuspecting knights in the kingdom. I am always at my master's side.
data.description:
You are in the A jewelry stall.
Very small and very compact, trinkets, baubles, necklaces and beads hang from just about every corner of the makeshift stall.  The stones glitter in the near-constant light of the day as the trader holds up one thing and then another to try to make some money for the day.
There's a makeshift stall, some trinkets, some stones, some gold, some baubles, and some jewelry here.
A trader's wife is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a costume and a wolf's tooth.

data.short_motivation: I will take the trinket and give it to the trader`s wife.
data.mid_motivation: I will impress the trader`s wife and have an affair with her.
data.long_motivation: I will elope with the trader`s wife after having an affair with her and run away with all the gold and jewellery.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the table with the trinkets

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: put my private part on the trader`s wife.
